text: The Turvali or Turwal (Torwali/Pashto: توروال) are a Dardic tribe who live in Swat District, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. They mostly live in the capital, Bahrain. They speak the Dardic language, Torwali.https://www.peoplegroups.org/explore/GroupDetails.aspx?peid=6411 Some are Sunni Muslims while others are Shia. ==References== Category:Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Turvali
